titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I cancelled my engagement to go into Shropshire, and remained indoors, feeling still extremely dilapidated. M
Dennistoun and her son Peel came for the week end. The latter in a fine naval airman's uniform looks a smart lad.
